attributes.action: Make payments to MPs completely visible and transparency to the public
attributes.additional_details: Parliamentarians are there to serve the public and this should be the very first priority, not private business, sponsorship, or any other outside payments
attributes.background: Pass a law legislation to make this possible

rejection.details:
MPs are already required to declare their financial interests, and these are published regularly: https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/standards-and-financial-interests/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/registers-of-interests/register-of-members-financial-interests/

We can accept petitions calling for changes to the requirements for MPs to declare financial interests, but it would need to be clear how you want these requirements to be changed.
